name: cloudspannerecosystem/autoscaler
Description: Autoscaling for Cloud Spanner based on CPU metrics

scripts.install-all: set -e ; root="$PWD"; for x in . src/autoscaler-common src/scaler/scaler-core src/scaler src/forwarder src/poller/poller-core src/poller src ; do cd "$root" ; cd "$x" ; pwd ; npm install --save; done
